topics.body:
I just thought of something hilarious and fun: since me and squiggy and other members are extremely good at corrupting everyone why not make a game about it; take a shot every time you get someone corrupt someone and make them try something you know they don't like.

1 shot if you get someone to try something weaboo/geeky
2 shots if you make them question their sexuality
3 shots if you get them to play a game that is outside of what they like
The entire bottle if you get them to like something they hate; like if you get me to like a shonen manga or if you get trashboat to like real life humans or if you get whatevs to like a very weaboo manga or such.


/semi-joke post
